sentences.cn: “ 够了, ”德伐日说, 因为不耐烦,显得严厉.

sentences.en: A great wave of compassion had swept away his indifference and impatience.
sentences.cn: 一股同情的巨浪涌来,把他的冷漠和急躁情绪一扫而光.

sentences.en: A note of impatience had entered his voice.
sentences.cn: 他的语气开始透出一丝不耐烦。

sentences.en: Ase said with an impatience that made his mother blink.
sentences.cn: 埃斯说这话时表现出的不耐烦使他的母亲直眨眼.

sentences.en: He expressed impatience at the slow rate of progress.
sentences.cn: 进展缓慢,他显得不耐烦.

sentences.en: He gave a stamp of impatience.
He kicked the chair in a spasm of impatience.
sentences.cn: 他突然变得不耐烦,一脚踢向椅子.

sentences.en: He stamped his feet as he waited with barely concealed impatience for the telephone.
sentences.cn: 他等电话时跺脚,几乎掩盖不住焦急的心情.

sentences.en: He waited with barely concealed impatience.
sentences.cn: 他等待着,几乎无法掩饰不耐烦的心情.

sentences.en: He was trying hard not to show his impatience.
sentences.cn: 他竭力掩饰自己的不耐烦.

sentences.en: She fussed about, unable to hide her impatience.
sentences.cn: 她激动不安, 无法掩饰她的急躁.

sentences.en: She showed impatience to continue the climb.
sentences.cn: 她迫不及待地想要继续攀登。

sentences.en: Some impatience was exhibited owing to the non - arrival of the speaker.
sentences.cn: 由于讲演人未到,听众显得有些不耐烦.

sentences.en: The horses were pawing the ground in their impatience to start.
sentences.cn: 马儿在用脚搔地,迫不及待地准备出发.

sentences.en: There is a certain impatience among some of the soldiers.
sentences.cn: 有些士兵有点儿不耐烦。

sentences.en: There was a hint of impatience in his tone.
sentences.cn: 他的语气中透出些不耐烦。

trans.tran_en: annoyance at having to accept delays, other people’s weaknesses etc
